TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TestFixtureBuilder extends System.Object

Docs.summary: TestFixtureBuilder contains static methods for building TestFixtures from types. It uses builtin SuiteBuilders and any installed extensions to do it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool CanBuildFrom(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether this instance [can build from] the specified type.
Docs.returns: true if this instance [can build from] the specified type; otherwise, false.
